data.eml:eml: Pseudogramma polyacantha complex (Serranidae, tribe Grammistini): DNA barcoding results lead to the discovery of three cryptic species, including two new species from French Polynesia

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Williams, Jeffrey T., Viviani, Jeremie (2016): Pseudogramma polyacantha complex (Serranidae, tribe Grammistini): DNA barcoding results lead to the discovery of three cryptic species, including two new species from French Polynesia. Zootaxa 4111 (3): 246-260, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4111.3.3
